briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Immunoglobulin Intravenous (Human) 10% (NewGam) in Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia
officialTitle: Prospective, Open-label, Non-controlled, Multicenter, Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Immunoglobulin Intravenous (Human) 10% (NewGam) in Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia
summary: NewGam is a newly developed human normal immunoglobulin solution for intravenous administration (IGIV). This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of NewGam 10% in patients with primary immune thrombocytopenia.
